### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mining Drill at position(43.0, -82.0)
Consists of a Burner Mining Drill at position(43.0, -82.0) and a Chest at position(42.5, -83.5)

### Stone Furnace at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of a Furnace at position(41.0, -82.0)

### Coal Storage at position(42.5, -83.5)
Consists of a Chest at position(42.5, -83.5)

### Coal Storage at position(43.5, -79.5)
Consists of a Chest at position(43.5, -79.5)

### Coal Storage at position(44.5, -81.5)
Consists of a Chest at position(44.5, -81.5)

### Coal Storage at position(45.5, -80.5)
Consists of a Chest at position(45.5, -80.5)

### Inserter System at position(43.5, -80.5)
Consists of a Burner Inserter at position(43.5, -80.5) connected to a Chest at position(44.5, -81.5) and a Chest at position(43.5, -79.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from a chest
- Ensure the chest contains the item you are trying to extract before attempting extraction
- Make sure to check the chest's inventory before extracting items

### Errors when a chest at the drop position is full
- Empty the chest at the drop position to continue mining
- Ensure the inserter system is properly configured to handle full chests

### Errors when an entity is waiting for source items
- Ensure the entity has a valid source of items to pick up
- Check the entity's neighbours to ensure they are providing the necessary items
